{"doc":{"info":{"calaisRequestID":"a30c3062-0ed0-6347-146f-22b321e4ae6a","id":"http://id.opencalais.com/paBi98pfQKC0NOg0Yo1vAQ","docId":"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/bf8320d9-3227-3b1b-96c2-b2c0666cb644","document":" ￼And if he still felt a compelling need For something on the side There were always first or second or third year students (Girls, of course. He wasn\u2019t like that), Who needed extra encouragement. \n￼Wordsworthian / Ovidian Episde to Patricia Highsmith Miss Highsmith, O Miss Highsmith, Dear Patricia - No blush would mantle our good Laureate\u2019s cheek For this effrontery, but James\u2019s would - Henry I mean, not the footman. That odious Strether Is utterly more wretched than poor Ripley! Poor Tom\u2019s a-cold, we\u2019d shelter him, Make him a retrospective Harvard man, W arranted Ivy League, the nicest type, With an instinctive nice discrimination. Psychopathic, yes, but not psychotic - Scapegoat for the massive psychic malaise Of all the (just how many?) vast United / a /_ . ' £ States of half^Americ\u2019s north half. How good a President he would have made With all of Carter\u2019s toothy dishiness, And Shadow/Nixon, shaved a' five o\u2019clock - You know of course the work of Doctor Jung, And hypostasis of the Animus. (I\u2019ve trouble with the Anima myself). Think of Tom Sawyer, somehow self-educated, And there you\u2019d have him in a^Boeks- Bros, suit, But he\u2019d know better than a Brooks Bros. suit. k (I only ran to Moss Bros, suits myself). If I parade some Limey prejudices Your lady-writers give me ammunition, Mesdemoiselles McCarthy and McCullers, Dorothy Parker, and yourself not least. So right, his palazzo, Venetian, For me, at least. Not Corvo\u2019s. Not Visconti\u2019s. How witty is his choice of lumpish victims! (The passage in your work that most makes wince Is when they dub drab Mongibello, \u2018Mongy\u2019. I know that coast. Christ halted near there.) How justified the death ofJonathan In being awarded an heroic end! I didn\u2019t know that photographs could haunt On coloured book-jackets. Yours does. 152 iVooyles \n￼Dark, handsome, noble, Sybilline, compulsive Your witch\u2019s eyes demand obedience. I rest my case. Give me the daggers. With fondest \n￼Lament for Bing Crosby Dead, Mister Crosby, dead This unbelieving generation Would smother you in soft white christmases Molasses of gossamer indulgence Your greatness, sharp legato greatness 0 Mister Crosby, Mister Crosby, Mister Crosby (I trust that I can make the matter clear) You were greater far before all that That going other people\u2019s ways down various roads When you would take it up and keep it going keep it going With Mercer, Mister Mercer... also dead No \u2018entertainer\u2019, but an actor, a true histrion Did you not act with Fields and not upstaged? Fields, W.C., dead also, long ago in glory Didn\u2019t you ramble with Armstrong, also dead We\u2019ve got to accentuate the positive Eliminate the negative of smooth Sinatra 1got a message from the Mocking-bird That Sinatra was dead on his feet Sinatra made of plaster like our Joanie Biederbecke taughtyou, in mummer\u2019s digs, Music, disced Debussy and Stravinsky, And it stuck. You got rhythm but also Style, like you said style There are a few enthusiasts left Who can tell the difference Between the first and second versions of That Old Black Magic Old Black Magic Got me in
